item.title: Galtanor's 021 Linux dedicated
item.author: invalid@example.com (kistov)
item.dc:creator: kistov
item.content:encoded:
Hi folks,

the problem is: we want to change the wave config settings e.g. MaxWaveNumber=64 at warfare matches.. but i think this was just fixed in v021..

" Bugs Fixed
Version 021
* The Wave Manager does not find the correct wave configuration - reported by Cyzmyass "

the last update on v020 didn't work, the server crashed. the ut 1.3 beta3 patch didn't work either, it displayed many errors. is galtanor's v021 also compatible to our ut3 1.2 server version? or is it possible to change...

Galtanor's 021 Linux dedicated
